main event: A rotating, pulsing, and flashing bluish-green oval object, about 2 feet across, was observed ascending and descending behind the horizon in Trenton, Ohio on September 19, 1960.
interesting points: The object exhibited acrobatic movements, pausing and then descending behind the horizon.
Three lights were seen in erratic flight, hovering and taking off at high speed, appearing to be under intelligent control.
The objects were observed for about 30 minutes.
Local checks were made with various authorities, but no other reports were received regarding the sighting.
A similar sighting was reported by a SAC B-47 near Trenton, Ohio.
sighted object: rotating, pulsing, flashing bluish-green oval object; three erratically moving lights
